articles.description: Akshay Kumar slapped Bihar-based YouTuber Rashid Siddiquee with a notice, seeking damages worth Rs 500 crore for defamining him through his videos.

articles.title: Prabhudeva`s wedding to Mumbai-based doctor confirmed - Details here - Zee News
articles.description: Ace choreographer-filmmaker-actor Prabhudeva got married to a Mumbai-based doctor in May, his brother confirmed recently. Speculations were rife about Prabhudeva s wedding and initially, it was reported that he is getting married to his niece.
